fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39539].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
When attempting to preview an attachment in Attachments list macro, (in this case a .docx file), you receive error:

{quote}We can't preview this file. You'll have to download the file to view it.{quote}

!Screen Shot 2015-10-12 at 11.06.53.jpg|thumbnail!

However, if you add an attachment thumbnail of the same file at the bottom of the page, i.e. *Insert > Files and Images*, save the page, and then load that *first* and *then* try to load the preview from Attachments List, it then works.

h3. Environment
* Confluence Cloud 5.9.1-OD-2015.40.1-0001

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create page in Confluence
# Upload {{.docx}} test file
# Insert {{Attachments}} macro (remove any previews added by uploading document.
# On the next line, click *Insert > Files and Images*, select the document, insert.
# Save page.
# Expand attachments list and click *Preview* button. Preview will not load and you'll receive an error asking you to download.
# Click thumbnail you added below, preview will load. Sometimes you'll need to try this twice.
# Exit out of preview, and now try to load the preview from the Attachments list, and it will load.

h3. Expected Results
Preview should load on the first try.

h3. Actual Results
The only error from the logs appears when initially saving the page.
{noformat}
2015-10-12 11:00:01.181901500 2015-10-12 11:00:01,178 WARN [conversion-thread-cloud-10-internal] [net.sf.hibernate.StaleObjectStateException] <init> An operation failed due to stale data

2015-10-12 11:00:01.181904500 net.sf.hibernate.StaleObjectStateException: Row was updated or deleted by another transaction (or unsaved-value mapping was incorrect) for com.atlassian.confluence.pages.Attachment instance with identifier: 2621451

In Network Inspector, upon failed load, you get {{*wiki/rest/documentConversion/0.1/conversion/convert/2621451/undefined?_=1444640445461}}

On positive load you get {{*wiki/rest/documentConversion/0.1/conversion/convert/2621451/1}}
 
h3.Workaround
Include thumbnail of attachment and load preview from that.

ServiceDesk icon is gone from top banner

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39537].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
* The current document doesn't include that restricted pages might not be visible in the destination
* https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/import-a-confluence-space-724765531.html#ImportaConfluenceSpace-Step2.ExportthespacecontentfromthesourceConfluencesite

h3. Suggested Solution
"Restricted pages from the source Confluence space might not be visible in the destination Confluence. To see list of restricted pages go to Space Admin -> Restricted Pages.".
fields.summary: Add Notes on space import Documentation

  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39534].

postgresql syncronized failed.
there is no bug in "0xdbe-142.2927.6" version.

This is a error message.
`````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````
ERROR: column reference "oid" is ambiguous
  Position: 169
ERROR: column reference "oid" is ambiguous
  Position: 169
The SQL statement:
with S as ( select T.oid as type_id, C.oid as class_id
            from pg_catalog.pg_type T,
                 pg_catalog.pg_class C
            where T.typnamespace = oid(?)
              and T.typnamespace = C.relnamespace
              and T.xmin::varchar::bigint > ?
              and T.typrelid = C.oid
              and T.typtype = 'c'::"char"
              and relkind = 'c'::"char" ),
     A as ( select attrelid as class_id,
                   attnum as att_position,
                   attname as att_name,
                   pg_catalog.format_type(atttypid,atttypmod) as att_type
            from pg_catalog.pg_attribute )
select type_id, att_position, att_name, att_type
from S natural join A
order by type_id::bigint, att_position
`````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39533].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
In pages that are frequently editing Confluence's [concurrent editing features|https://confluence.atlassian.com/doc/concurrent-editing-and-merging-changes-144719.html] are not always enough, specially considering that merging cannot always be done

h3. Suggested Solution
Give a system option for the number of concurrent users per page. If this value is set as N, if an N+1 user attempts to edit the page, a message to wait is displayed.
fields.summary: Option to limit number of simultaneous users editing pages

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39531].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition

Logs can fill with HeartbeatAction errors in certain circumstances that end up generating excessive log files.
{code}
2015-10-09 14:46:14,400 ERROR [http-nio-443-exec-13] [atlassian.confluence.servlet.ConfluenceServletDispatcher] sendError Could not execute action
 -- referer: http://wiki.mycompany.com.au/pages/editpage.action?pageId=987654 | url: /json/startheartbeatactivity.action | userName: anonymous
java.lang.NullPointerException
...
{code}

h3. Suggested Solution

Please change the default product configuration to include the workaround presented on [Getting a lot of HeartbeatAction errors in the logs|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFKB/Getting+a+lot+of+HeartbeatAction+errors+in+the+logs]

{{log4j.logger.com.atlassian.confluence.pages.actions.HeartbeatAction = OFF}}
 
h3. Workaround 

As documented in [Getting a lot of HeartbeatAction errors in the logs|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFKB/Getting+a+lot+of+HeartbeatAction+errors+in+the+logs]

In {{<Confluence-Install>/confluence/WEB-INF/classes/log4j.properties file}}:
# Open the log4j.properties file in a text editor
# Add the string displayed below to a new line in the log4j.properties file:
log4j.logger.com.atlassian.confluence.pages.actions.HeartbeatAction = OFF
# Save the log4j.properties file
# Restart Confluence
fields.summary: Disable HeartbeatAction logging in Confluence

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39529].
  {panel}

Given that
1. We're trying to "hide" parts of the UI for only when they're needed to give the appearance of less clutter / bloat 
2. It's a useless feature to click on it and get zero 

This web-item should not appear unless there are one or more resolved comments
fields.summary: Tools > Resolved comments should not appear if there are no resolved comments
Ability to Restrict REST Request from Specific IP adresses

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39521].
  {panel}

Hi Guys,

We're using the roadmap macro quite heavily to give an indication on how a project would run. Because it's an indication, we don't use dates. 

An indication like Week 1, Week 2, Week N would make more sense for our use case. In the 'old' version of the macro, the headers where editable.. that would work too :-)

Cheers,
Stefan
fields.summary: [Roadmap Planner Macro] Different units beside dates

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39519].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
Page Export to PDF with JIRA Issue Macro showing "Getting issue details"

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a page with JIRA Issue Macro. Make sure the macro displays the result on the page
# Export to PDF

h3. Expected Results
Page exported with the macro displaying the JIRA issue number,summary and status

h3. Actual Results
Page exported with the macro displaying the JIRA issue number, _Getting issue details..._ and the word "Status"
 
h3. Notes
Sample of PDF output
!JIRAissueMacro.png!

h3.Workaround
No workaround at the moment
fields.summary: Page Export to PDF with JIRA Issue Macro showing "Getting issue details"
Space Imports with SpaceName the same as SpaceKey cause Template NullPointerException
Embedded PDF viewer should have a search function

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39514].
  {panel}

Link menu popup should not appear all the time.

For example I have a list of links. Then I want to create a more dense list of links by using shift + enter so that there is no gap between the links.

I need to do this so that
\- I go to the end of a link (_popup appears, I hit esc_)
\- Shift + enter to create row without gap (_popup appears, I hit esc_)
\- I go to the start of the next link (_popup appears, I hit esc_)
\- Hit del to move the link to the row without gap, (_popup appears, I hit esc_)
\- Move to the end of the link (_popup appears, I hit esc_)
\- Shift enter to create row without gap (_popup appears, I hit esc_)
\- ...

What ever I do, there is always a popup on the way, which is annoying. The popup should only appear, if I click on the link.
fields.summary: Link menu popup should not appear all the time

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39509].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
When viewing the Space permissions and page restrictions/page permissions, it would be nice to be able to see the users full details along with email, not just their user name/display name. This makes it easier to confirm the correct permissions are set. 

h3. Suggested Solution
JIRA has a mouseover functionality when assigning project roles that shows user details and even has a link to the user profile. This would be great in Confluence as well.
 
h3. Workaround 
Copy the username and search for the user in User Management
fields.summary: As an administrator, I would like for more user details to be available from the Permissions/Restrictions page

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39508].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
If a user deletes a space the administrator has to restore a site backup to a staging environment and export/import the space. 
h3. Suggested Solution
It would be great if spaces went to a "trash" and could be restored via the UI.
fields.summary: As an administrator I would like to be able to restore a deleted space from the UI

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39504].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
JIRA Issues Macro is inserted automatically with highlight and create issue requiring manual edit to remove the macro.

h3. Suggested Solution
Allow option for macro to not be inserted when doing highlight and create issue.
fields.summary: As a Confluence user, I want to highlight text and create issues without having the JIRA issue macro inserted into the page

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}

Hi, 

We try to install and activate Team Calendar Plugin, after activated all pages  of confluence are grey and show same error "Error occurred during template rendering: null. Contact your administrator for assistance".

Browse a Folder Within a Confluence Page
Mobile Confluence-Dashboard to provide name of Space related to Page

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39494].
  {panel}

h2. Scenario : 

Confluence + Jira = different user directory (same admin)
Jira = anonymous access for view and create issue

Confluence user can view Jira issues but cannot create Jira Issues.

h2. Steps to reproduce :

# Create application link (OAuth 3LO) for both incoming and outgoing for confluence-jira
# Go to Jira> Default permission schemes. Set "browse project" and "create" issue to Group(anyone). U can even set all permissions to Group(anyone) to get the same result.
# Go to Jira>field configurations. Put "optional" for "reporter"
# Try to create issue macro (using text-highlight or jira issue macro)
 
h2. Expected Behaviour
Confluence user can create Jira issues anonymously

h2. Current Behaviour
Confluence user has to log in to Jira to create issues despite the anonymous access enabled. Message shown:
{{Atlassian JIRA needs your permission to connect to Confluence.}}

If the user access Jira using the URL, he can create issues anonymously there.

h2. Workaround
# Use a different browser and access the Jira URL directly
# Open an incognito window and access the Jira URL directly
fields.summary: Confluence unable to create jira issue despite anonymous access
Disable Show Preview in Attachments Macro

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39491].
  {panel}

h4. Problem
Attachment preview is enabled automatically for attachment files within Confluence. This is unsupported on some browsers and for some users is an undesired response when clicking on an attachment.

h4. Suggestion
* Disable preview for certain file extensions
* Tell Confluence how to handle opening certain extensions
* Disable entirely for the instance.
fields.summary: Disable Attachment Preview

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39488].
  {panel}

Hi, Can anyone please help me to resolve the office power point issue in atlesssian confluence 5.7 tool?
 It first time that I am using this tool.Basically Trying to upload ppt in macro page, it has uploaded but couldn't see preview of page it renders error : 
*There was a problem converting this attachment. Please create an issue at http://jira.atlassian.com*

Kindly please help me asap it is urgent to fix this.
fields.summary: Office power point doesnt work in confluence 5.7 version

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39486].
  {panel}

Our customer wants to search Confluence with using tag names in a PDF file.
Could you add tags in PDF files to the targets of indexing in Confluence?

FYI. Please see following page to understand what are *tags in PDF*.
* [Add tags to existing PDF|http://help.adobe.com/en_US/acrobat/X/pro/using/WS58a04a822e3e50102bd615109794195ff-7d07.w.html]
fields.summary: Make tags in PDF become targets of indexing in Confluence
Add syntax highlighting for YAML in Code Block macro
CAC redirect and links not working

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39480].
  {panel}

h3.Problem Definition
It would be beneficial to allow Sticky Columns similar to Sticky Header Row Behavior (Freeze Row) in Confluence tables introduced in versions {{5.9.0-OD-55}} Cloud and {{5.8}} Server as described in:
- https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-9267

h3.Use Case
Locking a Number Column on a wide table that spans off the page.

h3.Suggested Solution
Add in the ability to Freeze a Column header in conjunction with Row Headers
fields.summary: Freeze Columns in table

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39479].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
Anonymous users are able to see/click the link to a JIRA issue macro links for publicly available pages.

h3. Suggested Solution
Provide ability to disable JIRA Issue links for anonymous users. Confluence users should still be able to have the links to use.
fields.summary: As a Confluence admin, I want to disable JIRA issue macro links for anonymous users
Option to Resolve Bottom Comments in a Page
Favorite Spaces on Confluence home page does not show all favorited spaces
Resolve conflict when merging from release/5.8 to master

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39472].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
When copying HTML representations e.g. mail copied from Microsoft OWA into Confluence. Confluence interprets the HTML formatting and some characters differently.

h3. Suggested Solution
* Ability to keep the formatting of copied content from HTML representations to Confluence.
fields.summary: Ability to keep the formatting of copied content from HTML representations to Confluence

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39464].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
When watching a page, users will get a notification that a new file has been attached to the page when edited through the office connector. This is probably because of the way the office connector works in the backend.

h3. Suggested Solution
If using the Office connector to edit these documents, the notification should say that a change was made to the page or that a document has been edited, not added.
fields.summary: Office connector attachment notifications are incorrect

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39463].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
Current Behavior in Confluence introduced in versions {{5.9.0-OD-55}} and {{5.8}} as described in:
- https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-9267

Allows Sticky table headers for Single Row of a table If an second row is added as a header the sticky feature no longer applies

h3. Suggested Solution
Add Multi Row scrollable table with Sticky Header capabilities

h3.Note:
The sticky option is disabled if any more than one header is used this includes if header row and column are both selected
fields.summary: Sticky table headers for Multiple Header rows

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39462].
  {panel}

You can configure the maximum indexable size of an attachment - https://confluence.atlassian.com/conf57/configuring-attachment-size-701435663.html

However, the way this works is that the content is still all extracted and then simply not saved in the index.

Customers often use this setting because large documents are resource intensive to extract the content from and often fail.  With the current implementation we're helping to not store the content, but we're still expending resources to extract the content.

Recommend that this setting be modified so that these files are excluded earlier in the process and not extracted at all.
fields.summary: Skip Context Extraction for large indexes when file exceeds max config setting
Send me Daily Update override confluence watch notification

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39458].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
When using [the JIRA Issues macro's|https://support.atlassian.com/confluence-cloud/docs/insert-the-jira-issues-macro] "Create issue" function, only system and specific mandatory custom fields are provided in the form.

Specific mandatory fields like:

* Tempo fields ("Account")
* Cascading

Will fail with the following message:

{noformat}
The required field Account is not available in this form. You will need to create your issue directly in JIRA.
{noformat}

h3. Suggested Solution
Add custom required fields (example: tempo account & team, Cascading) in the form provided when creating a new issue with JIRA Issues Macro when specific custom fields are set as required for the particular project chosen.
fields.summary: The form provided when creating new issue with JIRA Issues macro should provide custom fields set as required for the particular project chosen.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39457].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
Confluence does not provide a functionality which could allow attachments and child pages to inherit labels from its parent page. It could be useful for building RSS and Recently-Updated feeds. 
Currently only one Marketplace plugin provides solution for labels inherited during the page creation but it does not maintain them: if the page is moved the labels will not be updated accordingly.

h3. Suggested Solution
# It would be good to expand the present labeling system with:
#* Parent-child relations
#* Synonyms
#* Inheritance
# And to develop a toolkit to maintain the existing labels.

h3. Workaround
Currently the only possible way to inherit the labels from the parent page is to utilize the existing paid add-on from the Marketplace:  [Labeler|https://marketplace.atlassian.com/plugins/pl.com.tt.confluence.plugins.labeler.labeler]
fields.summary: Inherited labels for child pages and attachments

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39454].
  {panel}

h6. Problem Definition
As of now, should there an incremental synchronisation of an External User Directory fails in Confluence, there Confluence Administrator will only be able to identify it by navigating to _User Directories_ page itself.

h6. Suggested Solution
To implement email notifications feature in Confluence should incremental synchronisation fails so the Confluence Administrator would be able to detect it as soon as when the problem occurs to minimise the impact to Confluence users.
fields.summary: To Implement Email Notifications should Incremental Synchronisation Fails

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39452].
  {panel}

Confluence doesn't use permalinks in e-mails at this moment.
When a page title changes users won't be able to use the link to this page from their existing e-mail notifications as the link is now broken.

It would be better if Confluence made use of the short links, which never change

We noticed this when the page title of our "meeting notes" changed. For some pages Confluence displays a screen with a link to the new url. But not for all pages like this one. We get a _Not Found_ error from the server
fields.summary: Confluence should use permalinks in e-mails
cannot get license key

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39444].
  {panel}

*Issue Summary*
A user has a situation where they would like to select specific people from various ADs giving the select users from these users various permissions that allow them work on issues in Confluence(the users are expected to maintain their groups from their individual servers)

Due to the above scenario, setting up multiple directories would not be viable as Confluence would only read groups from the directory at the top of the order.

This would also allow the user filter groups from multiple directories.

*Expected Feature*
Allow user specify multiple Base DNs separating the different servers with a semicolon.

*Add-on*
Can this be extended to other products such as JIRA?
fields.summary: Allow Multiple Accept Multiple AD Base Dns

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39443].
  {panel}

h5. Problem Definition
SQL Server 2012 Express is not part of the [Supported Platforms|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Supported+Platforms] for databases.

h5. Suggested Solution
Add SQL Server 2012 Express as part of the supported platforms.
fields.summary: Add SQL Server 2012 Express as a Supported Database

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39441].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
Certain special characters inside MS office attachment such as Word (both .doc or .docx) and Excel (.xls) are not displaying properly when viewed in the new File Preview macro (newly introduced in 5.7.x)

h3. Steps to Reproduce
Steps to reproduce:
# Create a MS Office file containing special characters:
#* Umlaut characters like "ß" . Example file [^german-umlauts.xls] is attached
#* Polish characters like "ą". Example file  [^polish-characters.docx] is attached
#* Cyrillic characters. Example file  [^testcyrillic.doc]  is attached
#* Arabic characters. Example file [^العَرَبِية‎.docx] 
!Sample.png|thumbnail!
# Create a page
# Edit the page, Insert > File & Image > insert the file > save page
# *Preview* the Excel file. The special characters will be garbled:
!Bug.png|thumbnail!

or

# Add a page, insert the macro Attachments
# Add the sample attachments to the page
# Save the page, click on "Preview"
 !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail! 
# The special characters are garbled

h3. Expected Results
All characters are displayed correctly

h3. Actual Results
Some characters are garbled and not displayed properly
 
h3. Notes
This issue is not reproducible in 
# PDF file
# While clicking "View" in the attachment macro (Using the Office Viewer instead of View File Macro)

Characters observed to be causing this issue:
# Umlaut characters like "ß" .
# Polish characters like  "ą"
# All Cyrillic characters
# All Arabic characters
fields.summary: File Preview Macro Showing Garbled Characters for Office Documents Containing Certain Special Characters
Better control of daily notifications by adding possibility to mark users as to be ignored
"Page Not Found" for link from "Automatically detect browser setting"
Make the OCAuth Timeout Configurable and not hard-coded
Global Templates applied using space categories

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39435].
  {panel}

h3. Problem description:
To combine multiple tables, on different pages, into a summary table, as the following example:

Multiple tables:
{panel}
Table 1:
            Column1, Column2, Column3, etc.
Row 1: xxxxxxx,   aaaaaaa, bbbbbbb,
Row 2: vvvvvvv,   tttttttttttttt, fffffffffffffff,
Row 3: ccccccc,   rrrrrrrrrrrr, wwwww,
{panel}

{panel}
Table 2:
            Column1, Column2, Column3, etc.
Row 1: 11111111,  2222222, 3333333,
Row 2: 4444444,   5555555, 6666666,
Row 3: 7777777,   8888888, 9999999,
{panel}

h3. Suggested resolution:
Summary Table:
{panel}
            Column1, Column2, Column3, etc.
Row 1: xxxxxxx,   aaaaaaa, bbbbbbb,
Row 2: vvvvvvv,   tttttttttttttt, fffffffffffffff,
Row 3: ccccccc,   rrrrrrrrrrrr, wwwww,
Row 4: 11111111,  2222222, 3333333,
Row 5: 4444444,   5555555, 6666666,
Row 6: 7777777,   8888888, 9999999,
{panel}
fields.summary: An option to combine multiple tables into a summary table.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39424].
  {panel}

Every time an email is sent from confluence it would be a great feature if someone could reply to that email and then Confluence would take the contents of the reply and place it as a comment to the section of change in question.

So we have a page as follow
Title
line 1
line 2
line 3

Someone changes line 2 a note is sent out to watchers with the change.  Any reply would add a comment to line 2.

If it was a brand new page that was added and an email was sent out, then the replies would be added to the bottom comment section.
fields.summary: Incoming mail handler for Confluence

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39413].
  {panel}

Hi Confluence team

Please add a floating edit button/pencil (a la Google Docs etc.), probably at the bottom right of pages.

I frequently find myself at the bottom of a page, or in the middle of a long page, and have to scroll back up to the top (annoying plus I lose my place) in order to edit.

Otherwise it's all good. Keep up the great work. :-)

Cheers
James Robertson
fields.summary: Floating edit button (at bottom right of pages)

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39404].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
There are some changes that could be made to tighten the connection between Confluence and HipChat. 

h3. Suggested Solution
For example, it would be nice to be able to embed the HipChat client into Confluence (or even JIRA) so that a user could respond directly in the product (instead of having to switch to either the desktop, mobile, or web client). At the very least, it would be great to be able to embed a chat window for a single HipChat room into a Space.
fields.summary: Make HipChat integration blend more seamlessly with Confluence

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39403].
  {panel}

On the following page, https://confluence.ea.com/display/Msocial/Madden+Mobile++R8+Test+Plan, 
whenever a new task is added to the Roadmap a lot of empty space is added.

The more tasks I add the more empty space is added. 

I can't remove the empty space and the roadmap/calendar is taking up a lot of area of the screen without much information being shared.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39400].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
Attaching a file with double quotes (") in name yields different filename

h3. Environment
* Confluence Cloud version 5.9.1-OD-2015.40.1-0001
* Firefox version 40.0.3
* Chrome version 45.0.2454.85

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a page with any data. Add the Attachment macro
# Add attachment with filename with double quotes (eg: test"Chrome".pdf) by uploading to page (...), Choose file and Attach

h3. Expected Results
Filename uploaded same like original file in Attachment macro

h3. Actual Results
Filename changed to ".pdf (FireFox)
Filename change (") to %22, example: test "this".pdf > test %22this%22.pdf (Chrome)

h3.Workaround
* Drag & Drop files to the designated Drag & Drop area
* Upload while in Edit page
fields.summary: Attaching a file with double quotes (") in name yields different filename

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39398].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
Could you please improve behaviors of promoting blueprints in a space?

h3. Environment
Confluence 5.8.13

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Install vanilla Confluence
# Create a space
# Click 'Create' button on the space
# When a 'Create' dialog pop up, click 'Add or customise templates for the selected space
' link
# Click a 'Promote' link of any blueprint

h3. Expected Results
The blueprint should be promoted immediately after clicking 'Promote' link.
(I means that if we click 'Create' button without reloading the page, the blueprint should be shown as promoted one.)

h3. Actual Results
The blueprint is promoted after reloading the page (or moving to another page).
 
h3. Notes
If clicking 'Promote' link doesn't make some change on Confluence immediately, we should provide some ways to preserve the state like 'Save' button in the space blueprint setting page.
fields.summary: Improve behavior of promoting blueprints in a space
Access to confluence apis that has authenication enforced

com.atlassian.confluence.importexport.ImportExportException: Exception while rendering the PDF document /data/jirastudio/confluence/home/temp/pdfexport-20150925-250915-1458-137/IRISDOC-Clients-250915-1458-138.pdf

caused by: java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 0, Size: 0

Stack Trace:[hide]
com.atlassian.confluence.importexport.ImportExportException: Exception while rendering the PDF document /data/jirastudio/confluence/home/temp/pdfexport-20150925-250915-1458-137/IRISDOC-Clients-250915-1458-138.pdf
	at com.atlassian.confluence.extra.flyingpdf.FlyingSaucerXmlToPdfConverter.convertXhtmlToPdf(FlyingSaucerXmlToPdfConverter.java:102)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.extra.flyingpdf.FlyingSaucerXmlToPdfConverter.convertXhtmlToPdf(FlyingSaucerXmlToPdfConverter.java:49)

!Screen Shot 2015-09-25 at 9.58.52 AM.png|thumbnail!
h3.Workaround
-

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39379].

h3. Summary
The left panel in Confluence mobile doesn't respond in Safari in iOS 9 in mobile devices. When clicking the icons, nothing happens. This was seen both on iPhones and iPads.

This is the menu:
!menu.png|thumbnail!

I does work in Safari in iOS 8, though.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Access Confluence from a mobile device in Safari in iOS 9
# Click the button on the top left to open the left menu
# Click in one of the items

h3. Expected Results
The items work and take you to other pages.

h3. Actual Results
The menu items don't respond.
 
h3.Workaround
Use a different browser or device.
fields.summary: Left panel in Confluence mobile is not responding in Safari in iOS 9

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39377].
  {panel}

With the introduction of the new Project Sidebar, JIRA's Project summary page has many links and functions to view the progress and status of a Project.

However as a Project Administrator, I want a Confluence page to be the landing page, thus have the same kind of information available that is available to JIRA.

*Example Solution*
Provide a Version macro similar to the JIRA Versions Panel. 
a Macro to embed Reports. 

!versionprogress.png!

*Workaround*
Use the JIRA Roadmap Macro.
fields.summary: As a Project Administrator I would like the JIRA Project Overview Macro in Confluence.
Delete users are duplicated in the People Directory, and have two USERINFO records in the database

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39368].
  {panel}

In Confluence 5.8.x on Tomcat 8, clients are receiving messages as follows:
{code}
22-Sep-2015 16:29:05.107 WARNING [http-nio-8443-exec-2] org.apache.catalina.webresources.Cache.getResource Unable to add the resource at [/includes/css/blogpost-move-dialog.css] to the cache because there was insufficient free space available after evicting expired cache entries - consider increasing the maximum size of the cache
22-Sep-2015 16:29:05.108 WARNING [http-nio-8443-exec-2] org.apache.catalina.webresources.Cache.getResource Unable to add the resource at [/images/icons/savas_16.gif] to the cache because there was insufficient free space available after evicting expired cache entries - consider increasing the maximum size of the cache
22-Sep-2015 16:29:05.109 WARNING [http-nio-8443-exec-2] org.apache.catalina.webresources.Cache.getResource Unable to add the resource at [/images/icons/emoticons/lightbulb.png] to the cache because there was insufficient free space available after evicting expired cache entries - consider increasing the maximum size of the cache
{code}

This appears to be a widely known issue within Tomcat 8, not sure how clients can easily adjust cache, or if this is a concern as these are only WARNING messages, but it does cause a great deal of concern from clients.

*Workaround:*
h5. Suppress cache log warnings
To reduce the noise level of these WARNING messages:
# Go to Administration > Logging and Profiling
# Set the logging level to ERROR for org.apache.catalina.webresources.Cache
# If the class does not exist, add the class to the list of packages to be logged and set the logging level to ERROR

Not sure if these are truly harmless, or if this is indicative of a problem with Tomcat 8 and Confluence.
fields.summary: Excessive Log messages insufficient free space available after evicting expired cache entries
Specifiy group or user does not restrict view / edit of field

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39366].
  {panel}

*Observed*: When pasting the full text of a JIRA macro into a page in confluence, it is treated as plain text and not parsed as a macro.  Saving the page saved the pasted text as plain text.

*Expected*: When raw macro text is pasted into the editor, it is parsed as a macro.


*NOTE*: I have only tested this with JIRA macro text, but my assumption is that the page doesn't see a '{' or '}' character being typed, so it never goes through the macro codepath.  I would assume this would occur for all macros.

*Steps to Reproduce*:
1) Create a new page in confluence, but do not save it.
2) in a separate document have the following text types out and copied (changing the issue key to match your actual project): {jira:MAGS-1}
3) Paste that text into the confluence page from Step 1.
4) Observe how the editor does not change the text to a Jira issue macro.
5) Click "Save"
6) Observe that the text on the page is still {jira:MAGS-1}, not a JIRA issue macro
fields.summary: Macro codes should be parsed when pasted into editor

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39365].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
I would like the ability to create custom icons, including changing the size and color on a page basis as well as adding custom text next to the icons.

h3. Suggested Solution
Create a bundled add-on or functionality to allow this without having to rely on multiple add-ons/macros to do this.

h3. Workaround 
-Install the third party add-on [Font Awesome Icons for Confluence|https://marketplace.atlassian.com/plugins/com.argonio.atlassian.confluence.font-awesome-icons-plugin]
-Once on the page, embed this add-on in a Panel Macro to be able to add text next to the icon of your choice.
fields.summary: As an admin, I would like to be able to create custom icons in pages

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39357].
  {panel}

If the database collation and isolation level are initially set incorrectly, user will encounter a 500 error and the installation will never complete despite changing the database configurations to the correct one. 

The installer should have fixed this issue automatically instead of throwing a 500 error which isn't helpful at all.

h2. Environment :
* Confluence 5.8.10
* MSSQL 2012 and MSSQL 2014

h2. Steps to reproduce:

h3. Collation Problem 
# Create a database with a different collation other than SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
# Start the Confluence installation and enter all the details.
# Installation will throw an error saying that the collation is wrong.
# Set the right collation in the database
# Click either "Restart database setup" or "Setup database again"
# Enter the details again
# 500 error is shown and installation can never complete

h3. Isolation problem:
# Create a database with isolation level {{READ_COMMITTED_SNAPSHOT}} to OFF
{code:sql}
ALTER DATABASE <database_name>
   SET READ_COMMITTED_SNAPSHOT OFF
   WITH ROLLBACK IMMEDIATE;
{code}
# Start the Confluence installation and enter all the details
# Installation will throw an error saying that isolation level is wrong
#  Set {{READ_COMMITTED_SNAPSHOT}} to ON in the database
# Click either "Restart database setup" or "Setup database again"
# Enter the details again
# 500 error is shown and installation can never complete

h2. Cause : 

* Confluence home directory has files linked to the initial configuration of the database. 

h2. Workaround :
# Set the configurations correctly in the database
# Delete the {{<Confluence_Home>}} directory and restart the installation
fields.summary: 500 error when setting up database

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39356].
  {panel}

Hi,

As shown in the attached screenshot:
* If the instance displays a license banner,
* And if a Tipsy tooltip is displayed (e.g. on the RTE toolbar)
* Then the screen is shifted down by 10-20px,
* Then the Tipsy tooltip disappears, because the mouse isn't over the element anymore,
* Then the screen is shifted up by 10-20px,
* Then the mouse is back over the button, the tooltip appears, the screen shifts down and the user has to, em, chase the mouse.

Therefore it is very difficult to click buttons.

Notes of importance:
* It doesn't happen with other banners such as "maintenance window" on OnDemand,
* I assume all ecosystem developers probably face it, because the Developer License is 3hrs, so we can't develop without this banner. By the way it is annoying to not be able to develop more than 3 hours in a row, but that's a topic for another day. If you wouldn't mind fixing the license banner, that would be great already.
fields.summary: The license banner + Tipsy Tooltips causes the screen to blink unbearingly

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39354].
  {panel}

Currently, the Cache Statistic via _Administrations > Cache Management_ require manual calculation by Administrator to increase the Max Entries. i.e: currently, in order to adjust the max entries size, the following step is conducted:
# Manually, get the total number of content by running SQL queries for each of the entries that has low effectiveness while having high usage
# then, manually calculate 20-30% of those entries
# manually adjust the max entries via UI


Why this is not effecient: 
* it take time to determine the SQL queries needed
* in a lot of cases, support assistance is required to get the SQL queries

Suggestion: 
have a feature to calculate the total entries in the database and then, suggest the proper size for each of the entries. 
This feature does not need to be automatic when the Cache Management statistic is access. However, it could be bundled as part of the Health Check
fields.summary: Has Automatic Suggestion for Cache Statistic

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39338].
  {panel}

Rule-based Access Control Using Embedded Metadata to Provide Access Control by Embedded Labels

Our Premier Client is seeking to establish a much simpler security access mechanism which would approve and/or deny access to content using an embedded label within the metadata of a page. They have a similar functionality within a separate system of theirs that allows them to embed a Seurity label that allows them to define groups that may access a set of content by virtue of their group memberships and denies anyone accessing the content that is not a member of the approved group.

Basically, anyone who is a member of the approved group can view the page, anyone who is not a member of the group is denied. By placing this label in metadata, the creator is freed from the extra work of granting or denying users from accessing content that they should never access. Using this method they can easily create content without worry that any material will be viewed by parties that should not have access to that content.

This enables them to share sensitive data and meet requirements for regulatory and compliance that are in place without the overhead and burden of managing thousands of users and requests to access content (which costs time and effort to insure that the user should access the content or the potential mistake of a human granting access where it should not be granted).
This would be a feature that could benefit many clients and expand the footprint of the application as it could ease many of the security concerns present in the current access methods alone.

The implementation should be built such that a metadata label can create a restriction and access control on the page. Ideally this would be able to be embedded within templates within Confluence as well.
fields.summary: Rule-based Access Control Using Embedded Metadata to Provide Access Control by Embedded Labels

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39319].
  {panel}

I prefer to write mu user stories and acceptance criteria in Confluence. Its easier to write multiple stories in quickly, review and edit before making them into trackable items in Jira. 

One issue is that the Jira import module only supports one field when importing multiple rows in a table. It would be very helpful if the Jira import module supported multiple columns; specifically... 
User Story
Acceptance Criteria 

Additional/optional fields would be great but at least two would be huge!

Thanks!
Jon
fields.summary: Jira Import to support multiple table columns
Pages and Blogs Documentation Redirection

  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-39314].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
IE11: Edit in Office button is missing on preview file screen

h3. Environment
* Confluence Cloud
* Confluence Server
* Chrome and IE11

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Open a World file from a Confluence page using IE11 or Chrome


h3. Expected Results
!Screen Shot 2015-09-18 at 11.51.08 AM.png|thumbnail!

h3. Actual Results
The 3 dots icon is missing 

h3.Workaround
On Firefox the button is available
fields.summary: Edit in Office button is missing on preview file screen
